author: TacticalFox27
SpaceNavy
clothos-commander-bsg-legends.name: Clothos
clothos-commander-bsg-legends.ability:
When a friendly ship is defending, you may remove 1 raid token from the attacking ship to ready 1 defense token.
When a friendly ship activates, you may spend raid tokens on enemy ships within distance 1-5 to resolve a matching command token. If you do so, remove that raid token from the enemy ship.

author: TacticalFox27
SpaceNavy
william-adama-commander-bsg-legends.name: William Adama
william-adama-commander-bsg-legends.ability: When a friendly ship reveals a command, you may reveal and discard 1 dial from this card. That ship gains a matching dial to that discarded dial.

author: SpaceNavy
Link
Skyhammer
captain-keyes-commander-halo-legends.name: Captain Keyes
captain-keyes-commander-halo-legends.ability: Before a friendly ship resolves a :nav: command dial, it may discard that dial. If it does, after it performs its maneuver, it may perform a 0-speed maneuver with a yaw value of "I".

author: SpaceNavy
Link
Skyhammer
thel-vadamee-commander-halo-legends.name: Thel Vadamee
thel-vadamee-commander-halo-legends.ability:
Ships in your fleet gain Elite.
After both players have finished deploying fleets, you may redeploy up to 2 small ships or 1 medium-large ship. You may also redeploy up to 2 squadrons.

at-te-assault-brigade.author: Armada Legends
at-te-assault-brigade.name: AT-TE Assault Brigade
at-te-assault-brigade.ability: During your activation, you may discard this card. If you do, until the end of that activation, when attacking squadrons you may reroll 1 blue or black die.

external-droid-storage.author: Armada Legends
external-droid-storage.name: External Droid Storage
external-droid-storage.ability:
*Non-flotilla only.* 
:squadron: : You may discard up to 2 tokens from this card to activate that many additional squadrons with **AI**.

general-romodi-officer.author: Armada Legends
general-romodi-officer.name: General Romodi
general-romodi-officer.ability:
Non-huge ship only.
When attacking a squadron, if the attack is obstructed by a ship or obstacle, the attacked does not remove a die, and may add 1 blue die to the attack pool.

author: Armada Legends
ion-pulse-emitter-legends.name: Ion Pulse Emitter
ion-pulse-emitter-legends.ability:
Modification.
Ignition [Long]
When you perform an ignition attack, you may exhaust this card and spend a defense token. If you do, after the modify dice step, discard all attack dice. For each matching die face, resolve the following effects:
:hit:: The defending hull zone loses 1 shield.
:crit:: Each hull zone adjacent to the defending hull zone loses 1 shield.

author: Armada Legends
ionic-plasma-rotors-legends.name: Ionic Plasma Rotors
ionic-plasma-rotors-legends.ability:
Modification.
Ignition [Long]
Ignition,:crit:: Toggle the activation slider for each squadron within distance 1-2 of the defender to the activated side.

author: Armada Legends
kyber-beam-cannon-legends.name: Kyber Beam Cannon
kyber-beam-cannon-legends.ability:
Modification. "Beam" only.
Ignition [Long]
Treat your special battery dice pool as 9 black dice. You cannot add a non-black die to this attack.
While performing an ignition attack, all damage cards are dealt faceup. After you perform an ignition attack, discard this card.

rebel-one-title.author: Armada Legends
rebel-one-title.name: Rebel One
rebel-one-title.ability:
:nav: : When you execute a maneuver, increase your last yaw value by 1.
 :repair: : Instead of spending engineering points, you may have up to 2 squadrons at distance 1-2 recover 1 hull point.

author: Armada Legends
devastation-title-legends.name: Devastation
devastation-title-legends.ability:
Beam only.
When you would discard a :super-weapon: card on the equipped ship, you may discard this card instead.

author: Armada Legends
subjugator-title-legends.name: Subjugator
subjugator-title-legends.ability: At the start of the first round, you may replace 1 of your defense tokens with a :redirect: defense token.

author: Armada Legends
malevolence-title-legends.name: Malevolence
malevolence-title-legends.ability:
Ion only.
Ignition,:crit:: Cancel all attack dice and reduce the defender's speed to 0, then discard this card.
